law.catch_line: If a minor child has only 1 parent, the domicile of the child is the same as that of the parent....

section.section: If a minor child has only 1 parent, the domicile of the child is the same as that of the parent.
If the parents of a minor child live together, and the child lives with them, the domicile of the child is the same as that of the parents.

text.section:
If the parents of a minor child live apart, the domicile of the child is the same as that of:
the parent to whom custody is awarded; or
if custody has not been awarded, the parent with whom the child lives.
If a minor child does not live with either parent, the domicile of the child is the same as that of the person who acts in the capacity of a parent.
